title: Expanding classroom: Elizabethan village
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Worcestershire Education Authority, Eileen Molony and G Inger
brief_description: The pupils of the senior class at Ashton-under-Hill Primary School reconstruct life in Elizabethan times - constructing wattle-and-daub walls, weaving rush mats, cooking Elizabethan dishes, playing Tudor music, writing with quill pens, writing and giving their own interpretation of witches’ spells, and collecting herbs.
creator_credit_for_label: British Broadcasting Corporation, Worcestershire Education Authority, Eileen Molony and G Inger
